page.title: 15TUESDAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: School starts at{9:00}and we first of all go and join class 1 for assembly. We come back to our class for our first lesson which is maths until{10:30}when we have a break until {10:45}. The next lesson is English which is from a book with passages of writing taken from children's story books. Each passage has questions about it. I stop for at school for my dinner which costs 45p per meal. At{12:30}we have a long break until {1:15}. After that we have craft when we do things like sewing, macrame, corn dolly making or woodwork. At{2:30 we have another break until{2:45}after which we have recorders and handwriting. We go home at{3:45}.
